00202 
00204         inline void applyAdjustWithClamp(float* pComponent, float adjust)
00205         {
00206             *pComponent += adjust;
00207             // Limit to 0
00208             if (*pComponent < 0.0)
00209             {
00210                 *pComponent = 0.0f;
00211             }
00212             // Limit to 1
00213             else if (*pComponent > 1.0)
00214             {
00215                 *pComponent = 1.0f;
00216             }
00217         }
00218
